UseCases

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • UseCases.User
      • UseCases.Student

  • public class Student
extends User
    Student is a type of User. A Student can register and check her records. This class makes use of an enum to determine the Student's classification (Freshman, Sophomore, Junior, Senior).
    Version:
    November 17th, 2016
    Author:
    Ulises Martinez, Jorge Huerta, Christopher Tighe, Team Siki
    See Also:
    User, StudentClassification

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(Class course)
        Adds a course to the students' list of classes.
        Parameters:

      • unregister

        public void unregister(Class course)
        Removes a course from the students' list of classes.
        Parameters:
        course - The course that will be removed from the students' classes/schedule.

      • getClasses

        public java.util.Set<Class> getClasses()
        Returns:
        A set of classes that the student is currently enrolled in.

      • getGPA

        public double getGPA()
        Returns:
        The student's GPA as a double.

      • checkHold

        public boolean checkHold()
        Returns:
        True or false, depending if a student has a hold.

      • removeHold

        public void removeHold()
        If a student has a Hold, remove it by assigning it a false boolean value.
